name: MoneyMiner
description:
In the game Money Miner you try to earn money by mining cryptocurrencies.

You start as a poor student and work your way up to become a millionaire, trying to buy more and more graphics cards that will earn you more money.

Always keep an eye on the exchange rate, otherwise you can miss out on a lot of money.

The entire game is based on the exchange rate of the currency.

The exchange rate determines how well you mine and how expensive the cards are.

Therefore, you profit from high as well as from low exchange rates.

Development 

the game is developed by one person and therefore has some minor bugs which will be fixed over time.

This game is first and foremost a hobby project. 

Control

Move: W,A,S,D

Interact: F

Pause: Esc

Futur

The game will first go through its alpha phase and then be further developed.

The beta version is planned for the beginning of 2023.

After that, the next goal is to bring the game to Steam as a full version.
